p: A particular and recent concern about CHIKV is its potential to cause outbreaks in temperate regions where the Asian tiger mosquito, Aedes albopictus, has recently established, enabling local epidemics, such as in Italy in 2007 [ 32] and 2017 [ 33, 34, 35] and in France in 2010 [ 36] and 2017 [ 37].
